column2: My kids are like family to me.  Is it my right as a parent to decide which exterminated deseases come roaring back into the mainstream?
Do you support the right to abort after 580 weeks?
Should football players be forced to kneel before Zod?
After I lost my job, my friends and family offered thoughts and prayers on Facebook.  How do you plan to stabilize the exchange rate with USD?
That's all the time we have for this evening I'm afraid.  Thank you both for joining me.
